description:
Ubuntu 24.04 LTS official flavors are now available for download. Here’s what’s new in Kubuntu, Xubuntu, Lubuntu, Ubuntu Unity, Ubuntu Cinnamon, Edubuntu, Ubuntu Studio, Ubuntu MATE, Ubuntu Budgie, and Ubuntu Kylin.

The post Ubuntu 24.04 Official Flavors Are Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu 24.04 Official Flavors Are Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New

description:
Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) is now available for download powered by the Linux 6.8 kernel and featuring the GNOME 46 desktop environment. Here's what's new!

The post Ubuntu 24.04 LTS ‘Noble Numbat’ Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS ‘Noble Numbat’ Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New
